Class EventRepository

  • java.lang.Object

  • @Repository
public class EventRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Retrieves/updates User information through a MySQL database
    Author:
    James Robertson For more documentation see https://docs.spring.io/spring/docs/4.0.x/spring-framework-reference/html/jdbc.html
